definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: "city god"), a deity in Chinese Daoist mythology who is responsible for the affairs of the city.
sentences.chinese: 城隍是中国道教神话中守护城池的神明。

sentences.english: The sign is ruled by Venus.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座的守护星是金星。

sentences.english: The soldiers warded over the city.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们守护着这座城市。

sentences.english: My family has watch over the emperor's tombs for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 几个世纪以来，我们的家族都在皇陵守护着。

sentences.english: Shujie was asleep in baby carriage, his mother kept watch by side.
sentences.chinese: 舒哲在婴儿车上熟睡，他的母亲守护在车边。

sentences.english: Surrounded by guardsoul the little guy can perish the old guy thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 被守护魄环绕着的小家伙能彻底毁灭老家伙。

sentences.english: In this regard, the prevailing star for Aquarius is Uranus.
sentences.chinese: 在这方面，现行的水瓶座守护星是天王星。

sentences.english: This command launches the daemon each time the machine restarts.
sentences.chinese: 这个命令在机器每次启动时启动守护进程。

sentences.english: He was particularly associated with protecting stags and subduing snakes.
sentences.chinese: 他与守护神牡鹿和征服蛇怪有密切联系。

sentences.english: House Orien calls upon swiftblades to defend the house's interests with weapon and word.
sentences.chinese: 欧瑞恩家族号召快刃们用武器与言语守护家族的利益。

sentences.english: I watched the Barrow Prisons for over 10 thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 我守护这个手推车铁笼子已经有1万多年了。

sentences.english: The fifth column shows the degrees where rulership by term transfers.
sentences.chinese: 第五列的说明的是关于度数的每个区间的守护星体。

sentences.english: Previously each city had its own elementalist temple.
sentences.chinese: 先前每个城市有它自己的自然力守护神的寺庙。

sentences.english: Pisces is ruled by the planet Neptune.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼的守护星是海王星。

sentences.english: The blade and chalice guarding o'er Her gates.
sentences.chinese: 刀刃与圣杯守护伊门宅。

sentences.english: Police dog guards the peace of the Yuzhno-Kurilsk citizens.
sentences.chinese: 警犬守护着南库里尔斯克市民的安全。

definition: to wait for/to expect/to keep watch/to watch over/to nurse
to hold fast to/to stick to
asylum/shelter/to shield/to put under protection/to take under one's wing
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
to show concern and care for
